title: The Vaccine Book Parents Deserve: Empowering and Reliable Evidence to Make an Informed Choice for Your Children (Paperback)
author: Scott A Johnson
description: The majority of parents and health professionals sincerely believe that all vaccines are safe, and no credible research exists showing vaccines cause harm. While public health officials consider vaccines safe and effective for children, parents and informed health professionals are increasingly concerned about vaccine safety and the right to make individualized, informed choices.
cleaned_text: The majority of parents and health professionals sincerely believe that all vaccines are safe, and no credible research exists showing vaccines cause harm. While public health officials consider vaccines safe and effective for children, parents and informed health professionals are increasingly concerned about vaccine safety and the right to make individualized, informed choices. The Vaccine Book Parents Deserve serves as an empowering and reliable fact-based resource for parents to make informed choices concerning vaccinations. Better informed and armed with an advanced understanding of vaccine risks and benefits, you are equipped to intelligently discuss your concerns and decision with your primary healthcare provider.
